Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th and #56 Milwaukee Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Washington/ Clark
ShortDescription: Eastbound 60 Blue Island/26th and  56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, Clark, Monroe, Dearborn and Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #60 Blue Island/26th and  #56 Milwaukee  buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, Clark, Monroe, Dearborn and Washington, due to Street blockage near Washington/ Clark.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Southbound Reroute near Washington/ Clark.
ShortDescription: Southbound J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temp rerouted via Washington, Clark, Monroe, Dearborn and Washington, due to street blockage near Washington/ Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, Clark, Monroe, Dearborn and Washington, due to street blockage near Washington/ Clark.

 Northbound buses are not affected. Allow extra travel time.
